scripts.start: npm run prepare && npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run prepare && npm run webpack
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:public && npm run prepare:public-proto && npm run prepare:secure
scripts.prepare:public-proto-local_storage: rm -rf public/lib/y_static/local_storage_pb.js public/local_storage_pb.d.ts && pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -o public/lib/y_static/local_storage_pb.js public/proto/local_storage.proto && pbts -o public/local_storage_pb.d.ts public/lib/y_static/local_storage_pb.js
scripts.serve: npm run serve:public & npm run serve:secure
scripts.webpack: npm run webpack:public && npm run webpack:secure
scripts.postcss: npm run postcss:line-icons && npm run postcss:font
